item.description:
We have been invited by the Star riders (we worked with them last year at the Hog Wild for K9's ride) to attend their safety seminar.  It will cover group riding,safety/formation, hand signals, lane changing, entering highways, intersection crossing and road blocking.

While they do many of the same things that we do, we may even learn someting different. So for those not participating in either an advanced motorcycle class or the pediatric charity ride, feel free to come join us for a little bit of safety!

New Details:

location:  Hingham Public Library

               66 Leavitt Street (Rt 228)

 

Time:  130 to 330 pm

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Safety Seminar
